result.eng: What is special about the story is that you can never be sure of anything.

result.eng: They are scheming something!

result.eng: As part of this dirty conspiracy, the prince was put in the mad house.

result.eng: It's not just the weather's fault.

result.eng: She was collecting information about various people.

result.eng: Five spies were based around the country under false names.
result.ga: Bhí cúigear spiairí lonnaithe timpeall na tíre faoi ainmneacha bréige

result.eng: The biggest thing to notice on these people is how amateurish they were.
result.ga: An rud is mó atá le tabhairt faoi deara ar an dream seo ná chomh hamaitéarach is a bhí siad
result.orig: An rud is mó atá le tabhairt faoi deara ar an dream seo ná chomh hamaitéarach is a bhí siad

result.eng: They would often be in mortal danger.
result.ga: Bhíodh siad faoi bhagairt an bháis go minic
result.orig: Bhíodh siad faoi bhagairt an bháis go minic
result.html: Bhíodh siad faoi bhagairt an bháis go minicThey would often be in mortal danger.

result.eng: Everybody who was alive in 1963 says they remember exactly the point in time when they heard of President John F. Kennedy's assassination.
result.ga: Deir gach éinne a bhí beo i 1963 gur cuimhin leo go cruinn ala an ama ar chuala siad faoi dhúnmharú an Uachtaráin John F Kennedy
result.orig: Deir gach éinne a bhí beo i 1963 gur cuimhin leo go cruinn ala an ama ar chuala siad faoi dhúnmharú an Uachtaráin John F Kennedy

result.ponchtml: Deir gaċ éinne a ḃí beo i 1963 gur cuiṁin leo go cruinn ala an ama ar ċuala siad faoi ḋúnṁarú an Uaċtaráin John F KennedyEverybody who was alive in 1963 says they remember exactly the point in time when they heard of President John F. Kennedy's assassination.

result.eng: America was definitely under attack.

result.eng: He recruited 15 other people with experience in little else than violence, and they started training.
result.ga: D'earcaigh sé 15 duine eile nach raibh mórán taithí acu ach i bhforéigean agus chuadar faoi oiliúint
result.orig: D'earcaigh sé 15 duine eile nach raibh mórán taithí acu ach i bhforéigean agus chuadar faoi oiliúint

result.eng: The whole country remained under intensive security for a long while after that.
result.ga: D'fhan an tír go léir faoi dhianslándáil ar feadh tamaill fhada ina dhiaidh sin
result.orig: D'fhan an tír go léir faoi dhianslándáil ar feadh tamaill fhada ina dhiaidh sin

result.eng: Indeed, there are still some unanswered questions, expecially those about building seven.

result.eng: Milosevic was not solely responsible for every crime against humanity that happened while Yugoslavia was falling apart.

result.ponchtml: Níorḃ é Milosevic aṁáin faoi ndear gaċ coir in aġaiḋ na daonnaċta a ṫarla tráṫ titim as a ċéile don IúgslaivMilosevic was not solely responsible for every crime against humanity that happened while Yugoslavia was falling apart.

result.eng: They [ie. blogs] were dealing with a wide range of topics and giving opinions on everything under the sun.

result.eng: All you could hear the bloggers about... was deadly silence.

result.eng: The relaxed atmosphere of the Internet gives a platform to every sort of cantankerous git to give out to other people under the protection of anonymity.

result.ponchtml: Tugann scaoilteaċt an idirlín ardán d'aċan ċineál cancráin a ḃeiṫ ag caiṫeaṁ anuas ar ḋaoine eile faoi sciaṫ na ganḟiosaíoċtaThe relaxed atmosphere of the Internet gives a platform to every sort of cantankerous git to give out to other people under the protection of anonymity.

result.eng: The pupils were learning about the history of black people at school recently.

result.eng: By the end of the 17th century slave ownership was ended in Europe.

result.eng: By 1865, owning people was against the law in each of the United States.
